title: What Kind Of Freaky Stuff Is This
itunes:title: What Kind Of Freaky Stuff Is This
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 40 year old mother of an eighteen year old son and I need your opinion. We have a computer in our den and recently, I came home from work early and my son was acting weird. He had grabbed a pillow from the couch and he was clutching it, trying to hide himself. It was a very awkward moment. I knew what was going on, but I asked if he was okay. He said he was fine and he was going to head out to work a little early. When he left, I noticed that the computer was on and the speakers were knocked over.......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
